Herbaliz Fine Facial Oil, Lavender (2019 formulation)

Brand: Herbaliz

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil* infused with herbs (Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula)*, and Plantago Major (Plantain)*); Rosa Mosqueta (Rose Hips) Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil*. *Certified

and Plantago Major (Plantain)*); Rosa Mosqueta (Rose Hips) Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil*. *Certified Organic
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
